data.name: Lost Words: Beyond the Page - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The critically acclaimed Original Soundtrack for Lost Words: Beyond the Page, the multi-award-winning atmospheric narrative game is composed by BAFTA and Ivor Novello nominated David Housden (Thomas Was Alone, Battletoads, QUBE 2), the score is a tour de force combining intimate, emotional moments and sweeping, fantasy grandeur. Recorded live at Ocean Way Studios with the Nashville Music Scoring Orchestra and featuring a number of virtuosic soloists, the score has been the recipient of multiple award nominations since release, going on to win the TIGA award for Best Audio.
